name: tule
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tall plant like grass that grows in wet areas of North America: The Central Valley had many foggy winter wetlands where tules grew. The habitat, which includes tule and duckweed, began taking shape in 2000.
More examplesFewer examplesNight herons have been found nesting in tule swamps. By the late 1800s, most of the tule marshes in the Central Valley had been drained.The eastern third of the county is quite level, more than 100,000 acres being composed of tule lands.
